pkgmetadata.longdescription: Latent Unknown Clustering with Integrated Data // An implementation for the 'LUCID' model (Peng (2019) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btz667) to jointly estimate latent unknown clusters/subgroups with integrated data. An EM algorithm is used to obtain the latent cluster assignment and model parameter estimates. Feature selection is achieved by applying the L1 regularization method.
